name: @elizaos/plugin-memory-root
description: Advanced memory management plugin for elizaOS with conversation summarization and long-term persistent memory
author: elizaOS Team

scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && python3 -m build || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets -- -D warnings || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check . && ruff format --check . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

MEMORY_SUMMARIZATION_THRESHOLD.description: Number of messages before automatic summarization

MEMORY_RETAIN_RECENT.description: Number of recent messages to retain after summarization

MEMORY_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD.description: Minimum confidence score to store long-term memories
